Translations.Text: efehasibe-llezine keferu ey yettehizu `ibadi min duni evliya'. inna a`tedna cehenneme lilkafirine nuzula
ellezine dalle sa`yuhum fi-lhayati-ddunya vehum yahsebune ennehum yuhsinune sun`a
ulaike-llezine keferu biayati rabbihim velikaihi fehabitat a`maluhum fela nukimu lehum yevme-lkiyameti vezna
zalike cezauhum cehennemu bima keferu vettehazu ayati verusuli huzuva
inne-llezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati kanet lehum cennatu-lfirdevsi nuzula
kul lev kane-lbahru midadel likelimati rabbi lenefide-lbahru kable en tenfede kelimatu rabbi velev ci'na bimislihi mededa
kul innema ene beserum mislukum yuha ileyye ennema ilahukum ilahuv vahid. femen kane yercu likae rabbihi felya`mel `amelen salihav vela yusrik bi`ibadeti rabbihi ehada
